OrgName: Peoplefluent (formerly Authoria, Inc and Peopleclick, Inc)
activities: Peoplefluent utilizes information entered on its corporate (www.peoplefluent.com) and application websites to process human resources and other information for itself and its customers relating to a wide range of internal and external functions, including employee compensation, performance and succession, recruiting and on-boarding, contractor management, learning management, workforce planning and analytics, and communications.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); for all other categories of data: TRUSTe
